Gold.en: A move that raises the user's ATTACK.

Silver.en: A move that raises the user's ATTACK.

Crystal.en: A move that raises the user's ATTACK.

Ruby.en: Reduces the polygon count and raises ATTACK.

Sapphire.en: Reduces the polygon count and raises ATTACK.

Emerald.en: Reduces the polygon count and raises ATTACK.

FireRed.en: The user reduces its polygon count to sharpen edges and raise ATTACK.
FireRed.de: Anwender senkt die Polygonzahl, um Kanten zu schärfen und erhöht ANGR.

LeafGreen.en: The user reduces its polygon count to sharpen edges and raise ATTACK.
LeafGreen.de: Anwender senkt die Polygonzahl, um Kanten zu schärfen und erhöht ANGR.

Diamond.en: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.
Diamond.de: Anwender senkt die Polygonzahl, um Kanten zu erzeugen, die den Angriffs-Wert erhöhen.
